item.title: Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels Ltd Edges Up 0.25% Despite All-Time Low
item.description: Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels Ltd closed the week ending 30 Jan 2026 with a modest gain of 0.25%, marginally outperforming the broader Sensex which rose 1.62% over the same period. The stock experienced significant volatility, hitting a fresh 52-week and all-time low on 27 Jan before recovering in the subsequent sessions. Despite the slight weekly advance, the stock remains under pressure amid weak quarterly earnings, rising interest expenses, and reduced institutional participation, contrasting with the Sensex’s steady upward trajectory. Time: 48 minutes ago
